crops.name: Potato Early Blight
crops.description: Dark concentric rings on older leaves.

crops.name: Tomato Mosaic Virus
crops.description: Mottled light and dark green pattern on leaves.

crops.name: Rice Blast
crops.description: Diamond-shaped lesions with gray centers.

crops.name: Wheat Rust
crops.description: Reddish-orange pustules on stems and leaves.

crops.name: Corn Smut
crops.description: Large gray galls on ears and tassels.

crops.name: Apple Scab
crops.description: Olive-green velvety spots on leaves.

crops.name: Grape Powdery Mildew
crops.description: White powdery coating on leaves and fruit.

crops.name: Banana Fusarium Wilt
crops.description: Yellowing of older leaves and vascular discoloration.

crops.name: Mango Anthracnose
crops.description: Black sunken spots on fruit and flowers.

crops.name: Orange Citrus Canker
crops.description: Raised corky lesions on fruit and leaves.

crops.name: Onion Downy Mildew
crops.description: Pale spots turning violet/purple on leaves.

crops.name: Carrot Leaf Blight
crops.description: Dark brown necrotic spots on foliage.

crops.name: Cucumber Mosaic
crops.description: Yellow mottling and stunted growth.

crops.name: Pepper Bacterial Spot
crops.description: Small water-soaked spots on leaves.

crops.name: Spinach Leaf Spot
crops.description: Small circular spots with pale centers.

crops.name: Cotton Root Rot
crops.description: Sudden wilting and death of plants.

crops.name: Sugarcane Red Rot
crops.description: Reddish patches inside the cane stalk.

crops.name: Coffee Rust
crops.description: Yellow-orange powdery spots on leaves.

crops.name: Tea Blister Blight
crops.description: Blister-like swellings on young leaves.

crops.name: Soybean Rust
crops.description: Tan to reddish-brown lesions.

crops.name: Strawberry Botrytis
crops.description: Gray mold growing on fruit.

crops.name: Peach Leaf Curl
crops.description: Red, puckered, and curled leaves.

crops.name: Lemon Scab
crops.description: Warty, corky lesions on fruit.

crops.name: Watermelon Wilt
crops.description: Vines wilt during the day and recover at night.

crops.name: Almond Canker
crops.description: Sunken lesions on branches.

crops.name: Cabbage Black Rot
crops.description: V-shaped yellow lesions at leaf edges.

crops.name: Cauliflower Mosaic
crops.description: Vein clearing and banding.

crops.name: Eggplant Blight
crops.description: Target-like spots on leaves.

crops.name: Garlic Rust
crops.description: Orange pustules on leaves.

crops.name: Pumpkin Mildew
crops.description: White powder on leaf surfaces.
